message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for you, estimated at $15,000. Given its unique qualities and benefits, I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering this, I propose to sell the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects the significant savings compared to its true value, making it an attractive proposition. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further with you.
